# Enrichment Docs

> Documentation for Enrichment Docs.

*Topics available: 5*

- [Application log enricher](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/enrichment/application-log-enricher.md): Learn how to use the application log enricher to add application-specific information to your telemetry in .NET.
- [Application metadata](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/enrichment/application-metadata.md): Learn how to use the application metadata to add service-specific information to your service in .NET.
- [Custom log enricher](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/enrichment/custom-enricher.md): Learn how to use the custom log enricher in .NET.
- [Log enrichment overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/enrichment/overview.md): Learn about log enrichment in .NET and how to enhance your logs with contextual information.
- [Process log enricher](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/enrichment/process-log-enricher.md): Learn how to use the process log enricher in .NET.
